item.title: skills
item.description: Speech Analysis: Praat, Wavesurfer Speech Manipulation: Praat, iZotope, Audacity ERP/EEG: Matlab, ERPlab/EEGlab Experimental Design: E-Prime, PsychoPy, Presentation (Neurobehavioral Systems) Statistical Analysis & Data Visualisation: RStudio, R markdown Other programming languages known: Python Text typesetting: TeX, Microsoft Word
